She wrapped it in a napkin and ran to the barn. She found Brownie in his stall and gave him a hug. "Hello, Brownie," she said. "I have a treat for you. Do you want some bread and jam?" Brownie nodded and snorted. He took the bread from Sara's hand and ate it in one bite. He licked his lips and nuzzled Sara's cheek. He was happy and grateful. "Thank you, Sara," he said in his horse way. "That was yummy. You are very kind." Sara smiled and stroked his mane. She felt happy and proud. "You're welcome, Brownie," she said. "You are my best friend. I love you." They hugged and played for a while. Then Sara and Brownie went back to the house to join grandma for lunch. They had a cheerful day.
